Class Players

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Players

  • public class Players
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Players(int amount)
      The constructor method creates an objet Players that has an amount of players
      pre: To create the objet players is needed the amount of players that are going to be added post: Creates an objet player with a genereated char that is going to be the first, and sets the size to 1
      Players(int amount, java.lang.String names)
      The constructor method creates an objet Players that has an amount of players
      pre: To create the objet players is needed the amount of players that are going to be added and the icons post: Creates an objet player with a given char that is going to be the first, and sets the size to 1

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void addPlayers(int amount, Player aux)
      This method adds a player next to the one that is on param with an autogenerated icon, then calls him self to make a list following the amount
      pre: it has to be called by the constructor of Players post: adds a player next to the one that is on param

        public void addPlayers(int amount,
                       Player aux,
                       java.lang.String names)
        This method adds a player next to the one that is on param, then calls him self to make a list following the amount

        Parameters:
        amount, - the amount of Players that the user wants
        aux, - the player that will get added the next
        names, - the icons of the Players
